author: crogers
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-1059 - ClassCastException when InternalUtils.addActionError() casts ActionMessages for the Global.ERROR_KEY attribute to a sub class, ActionErrors.
Added a test to cover this scenario.
